119  void operator()(SeqViewDouble& v1) {
120 
121  if (v1.GetSize() != mWindow.size()) {
122  Resize(v1.GetSize());
123  LogWarning("WelchWindow: Resizing window");
124  }
125 
126  execute(
127  *v1.GetData(),
128  *v1.GetData()

132 
141  void operator()(SeqViewDouble& v1, SeqViewDouble& v2) {
142 
143  Dmatrix *arg1 = v1.GetData();
144  Dmatrix *arg2 = v2.GetData();
145 
146  if (v1.GetSize() != mWindow.size()) {
147  Resize(v1.GetSize());
148  LogWarning("WelchWindow: Resizing window");
149  }
150 
151  if ((arg1->size1() != arg2->size1()) || (arg1->size2() != arg2->size2())) {
152  arg2->resize(arg1->size1(), arg1->size2());
153  LogWarning("WelchWindow: Resizing output");
154  }
155 
156  execute(*arg1, *arg2);
157 
158  v2.SetScale(v1.GetScale());
159  v2.SetStart(v1.GetStart());
160  v2.SetSampling(v1.GetSampling());
161 
162  };
163 
169  void Resize(unsigned int size) {
170  BaseWindow::Resize(size);
171  FillWindow();
172  }

207  void FillWindow() {
208  double norm = 0.0;
209  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < mWindow.size(); i++) {
210  double x = mWindow.size() - 1;
211  double q = (x - 2 * i) / x;
212  mWindow(i) = 1.0 - q*q;
213  }
214  Normalize();
215  };
216 
217 
218  };
